body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       The trail is not currently open as a national historic trail, although some sections are accessible by the public under State and County jurisdiction. Visitors are directed to the State Trails (Na Ala Hele) website pertaining to the Ala Kahakai, or contact at Na Ala Hele Trails & Access Specialist, Hawai'i Island, Department of Land & Natural Resources, 19 East Kawili Street, Hilo, Hawaii 96720. Telephone: 808 974-4217 email.
title: Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail: Operating Hours & Seasons
